name: 404 Page by SeedProd
author: SeedProd

sections.description:
The 404 Page by SeedProd plugin allows you quick and easily set up a custom 404 page for your website.

Simple and flexible, the 404 Page plugin works with any WordPress theme you have installed on your site.

  • Upgrade to the 404 Page Pro Version and Collect Leads on your 4040 Page!»

Benefits, Features and Options:

  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Replaces your themes 404 page.
  • Completely customizable look and feel including Background Color and Image, Logo, Fonts etc…
  • Easily add Custom CSS and HTML
  • Stretch Background Image to Cover the Entire Browser
  • Uses HTML5 & CSS3
  • Translation Ready, i18n Support
  • Multisite Support
  • BuddyPress Support

Pro Version Features:

  • Capture Emails and Turn Your 404 Page in to a Lead Generation Tool
  • Mobile Ready responsive design and layout
  • Advanced Custom Look & Feel with no coding
  • Integrated Google and Typekit fonts
  • Full Browser Backgrounds option
  • Capture emails and turn your 404 page in to a lead generation tool.
  • Videos can be embedded in the description just be entering the URL
  • Display an Incentive after Sign Up
  • Social Profiles & Social Sharing Buttons
  • MailChimp, AWeber, Get Response, Constant Contact and Campaign Monitor integration
  • Gravity Forms integration to collect info from visitors
  • Store Emails in the WordPress Database to export to any email service
  • Automatic Easy Updates
  • Shortcode Support
  • Custom CSS Support
  • Import/Export Settings for backup or re-use purposes
  • Multisite Support
  • HTML5 & CSS3 which degrades gracefully for older browsers
  • Translation Ready i18n Support

  • Plus lots more…

  • Upgrade to the Pro Version Now!»
sections.installation:
Manual Installation

  1. Upload the ultimate-coming-soon-page folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit Settings > Coming Soon to enable the coming soon page and set your options.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Manual Installation

  1. Upload the ultimate-coming-soon-page folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit Settings > Coming Soon to enable the coming soon page and set your options.

short_description: Creates a Custom 404 Page for your WordPress Site.
